channel.title: CHICAS News
channel.description: Latest Information from the CHICAS Stats/Epi group at Lancaster

item.title: Software Skills Workshops for 2021
item.description: Level-up your research software skills with a series of Thursday workshops.

item.title: Student Project Showcase Launch
item.description: We have now launched our student showcase page, highlighting the work done by taught postgraduate students.

item.title: COVID-19 Coronavirus Research
item.description: A number of CHICAS research staff and students are now devoting much of their research efforts to COVID-19-related activity. Our modelling activities are helping to advise and support pandemic response and decision making in the UK and internationally. You can read about our work on the COVID-19 project page.

item.title: Peter Diggle's 70th Birthday Celebrations
item.description: University Distinguished Professor Peter Diggle celebrated his 70th birthday recently.

item.title: PhD Student Honoured in Sri Lankan President's Awards
item.description: Dileepa Ediriweera's snakebite research recognised in prestigious national awards.
